query:
ALTER TABLE challenge_submissions 
ADD COLUMN score DECIMAL(5,2) AFTER evaluationScore,
ADD COLUMN reviewerComments TEXT AFTER score,
ADD COLUMN publicVotes INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER reviewerComments,
ADD COLUMN judgeVotes INT DEFAULT 0 AFTER publicVotes;
